item.title: Modeling Umpire Calls
item.description: Introduction Batting and pitching data from Major League Baseball Advance Media Modeling called strike probabilities Previous work General model description Called strike probabilities modeled in Stan Model diagnostics Called strike probability predictions from the modeled posterior Bibliography Introduction The goal of baseball pitchers — when contributing to team defense — is to put out batters. Two ways are (mostly) within the pitchers’ control. They may earn a called strike or a swinging strike.
